publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2977 Christina McKelvie: Remembering the Holocaustâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the funding from the Scottish Government for school pupils to travel to Auschwitz and the agreement between the Scottish Government, the Holocaust Educational Trust and COSLA to organise that travel; notes that this is the first time that a Scottish administration has provided funding directly to this project, and hopes that each new generation in Scotland renews the collective memory of the World War II Holocaust and commits to ensuring that it can never be repeated.

S3M-2977 Remembering the Holocaust (lodged on 27 November 2008) Bob Doris*, Aileen Campbell*, Alex Neil*, Alasdair Allan*, Keith Brown*, Stuart McMillan*, Jackson Carlaw*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bashir Ahmad*, Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-2977 Remembering the Holocaust (lodged on 27 November 2008) Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2977 Remembering the Holocaust (lodged on 27 November 2008) John Scott*, Dave Thompson*
